'''''cirya''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "ship"<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, pp. 74, 147</ref> or "cleft, pass".<ref>{{RGEO|5}}, p. 62</ref>

==Etymology==
Both meanings come from the [[root]] ''KIR'', related with "cut, cleave, pass swiftly through".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, entry ''kir-''</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Arciryas|Ar'''cirya'''s]]'' = "Noble Ship-(?)"
* ''[[Ciryaher|'''Cirya'''her]]'' = "Ship-lord"
* ''[[Ciryandil|'''Cirya'''ndil]]'' = "Ship-friend"
* ''[[Ciryatan|'''Cirya'''tan]]'' = "Shipbuilder"
* ''[[Ciryatur|'''Cirya'''tur]]'' = "Ship-master"
* ''[[Tarciryan|Tar'''cirya'''n]]'' = "High Ship-(?)"

* ''[[Calacirya|Cala'''cirya''']]'' = "Pass of Light"

==Cognate==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[cirith]]''

*[[The Plotz Declension]]
